xuiSorter
directive in module xui

Description

Dropdown that emits sort events on item-selection and on selected-item-click. Click the selected value to toggle the sort order (asc/desc).

Usage

as element:
<xui-sorter
       caption="{string}"
       items-source="{any[]}"
       selected-item="{any}"
       display-value="{string}"
       sort-direction="{string}"
       on-change="{function}">
</xui-sorter>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
captionstring

Value used as a label for the Sorter dropdown.

items-sourceany[]

Value used to populate the Sorter dropdown.

selected-itemany

Value used as the initially selected item.

display-valuestring

Specifies the field of the selected item used for display.

sort-directionstring

Variable for sort direction. Values can be: asc, desc or original.
original value means that order of items should be preserved and sorting shouldn't be applied at all. This value is intended to be used as initial and when user changes it to other value, it can't be selected back by UI

on-changefunction

Function to execute when sorting changes. Accepts two parameters: 'newValue' and 'oldValue'.
